hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Install build dependencies homedir=`pwd` echo $homedir sudo apt-get update -y sudo apt-get install -y git wget make bzip2 unzip gcc python python-dev python-setuptools python-lxml python-ldap libxslt1-dev libffi-dev openssl libtool g++ libssl-dev sudo easy_install pip sudo pip install paramiko httplib2 passlib six patch django call coverage==3.7.1 coveralls funcsigs pyzmq PyYAML pycrypto msgpack-python jinja2 psutil futures tornado
# Download source code git clone https://github.com/saltstack/salt cd salt git checkout v2017.7.1
# Install saltstack and check version cd .. sudo pip install -e ./salt salt --version
# Configure Salt master and minion
mkdir -p etc/salt/ cp ./salt/conf/master ./salt/conf/minion etc/salt/ cd etc/salt/
sed -i 's/#user: root/user: root/g' master sed -i 's,#root_dir: /,'"root_dir: $homedir"',' master
sed -i 's/#master: salt/master: localhost/g' minion sed -i 's/#user: root/user: root/g' minion sed -i 's,#root_dir: /,'"root_dir: $homedir"',' minion
cd $homedir sudo salt-master -c ./etc/salt -d sudo salt-minion -c ./etc/salt -d sleep 2m sudo salt-key -c ./etc/salt -L sudo salt-key -c ./etc/salt -A -y sudo salt -c ./etc/salt '*' test.ping || true
# Check master, minion process ps -ef | grep salt
# Unit and integration tests (optional) #cd $homedir/salt #sudo pip install git+https://github.com/saltstack/salt-testing.git#egg=SaltTesting #sudo pip install -r requirements/dev_python27.txt #sudo ./setup.py test
